section.title: core.memdbg
section.para: log level for memory debugging messages.

section.title: core.dst_blacklist_expire
section.para: how much time (in s) a blacklisted destination is kept in the list.

section.title: core.dst_blacklist_mem
section.para: maximum shared memory amount (in KB) used for keeping the blacklisted destinations.

section.title: core.dst_blacklist_udp_imask
section.para: blacklist event ignore mask for UDP.

section.title: core.dst_blacklist_tcp_imask
section.para: blacklist event ignore mask for TCP.

section.title: core.dst_blacklist_tls_imask
section.para: blacklist event ignore mask for TLS.

section.title: core.dst_blacklist_sctp_imask
section.para: blacklist event ignore mask for SCTP.

section.title: core.dns_udp_pref
section.para: udp protocol preference when doing NAPTR lookups.

section.title: core.dns_tcp_pref
section.para: tcp protocol preference when doing NAPTR lookups.

section.title: core.dns_tls_pref
section.para: tls protocol preference when doing NAPTR lookups.

section.title: core.dns_sctp_pref
section.para: sctp protocol preference when doing NAPTR lookups.

section.title: core.dns_retr_time
section.para: time in s before retrying a dns request.

section.title: core.dns_retr_no
section.para: number of dns retransmissions before giving up.

section.title: core.dns_servers_no
section.para: how many dns servers from the ones defined in /etc/resolv.conf will be used.

section.title: core.dns_use_search_list
section.para: if set to 0, the search list in /etc/resolv.conf is ignored.

section.title: core.dns_search_full_match
section.para: enable/disable domain name checks against the search list in DNS answers.

section.title: core.dns_reinit
section.para: set to 1 in order to reinitialize the DNS resolver.

section.title: core.dns_naptr_ignore_rfc
section.para: ignore the Order field required by RFC 2915.

section.title: core.dns_cache_flags
section.para: dns cache specific resolver flags (1=ipv4 only, 2=ipv6 only, 4=prefer ipv6.

section.title: core.use_dns_failover
section.para: enable/disable dns failover in case the destination resolves to multiple ip addresses and/or multiple SRV records (depends on use_dns_cache).

section.title: core.dns_srv_lb
section.para: enable/disable load balancing to different srv records of the same priority based on the srv records weights (depends on dns_failover).

section.title: core.dns_cache_negative_ttl
section.para: time to live for negative results ("not found") in seconds. Use 0 to disable.

section.title: core.dns_cache_min_ttl
section.para: minimum accepted time to live for a record, in seconds.

section.title: core.dns_cache_max_ttl
section.para: maximum accepted time to live for a record, in seconds.

section.title: core.dns_cache_mem
section.para: maximum memory used for the dns cache in Kb.

section.title: core.dns_cache_del_nonexp
section.para: allow deletion of non-expired records from the cache when there is no more space left for new ones.

section.title: core.dns_cache_rec_pref
section.para: DNS cache record preference: 0 - do not check duplicates 1 - prefer old records 2 - prefer new records 3 - prefer records with longer lifetime.

section.title: core.mem_dump_pkg
section.para: dump process memory status, parameter: pid_number.

section.title: core.max_while_loops
section.para: maximum iterations allowed for a while loop.

section.title: core.udp_mtu
section.para: fallback to a congestion controlled protocol if send size exceeds udp_mtu.

section.title: core.udp_mtu_try_proto
section.para: if send size > udp_mtu use proto (1 udp, 2 tcp, 3 tls, 4 sctp).

section.title: core.udp4_raw
section.para: enable/disable using a raw socket for sending UDP IPV4 packets. Should be faster on multi-CPU linux running machines..

section.title: core.udp4_raw_mtu
section.para: set the MTU used when using raw sockets for udp sending. This value will be used when deciding whether or not to fragment the packets..

section.title: core.udp4_raw_ttl
section.para: set the IP TTL used when using raw sockets for udp sending. -1 will use the same value as for normal udp sockets..

section.title: core.force_rport
section.para: force rport for all the received messages.

section.title: core.memlog
section.para: log level for memory status/summary information.

section.title: core.mem_summary
section.para: memory debugging information displayed on exit (flags): 0 - off, 1 - dump all the pkg used blocks (status), 2 - dump all the shm used blocks (status), 4 - summary of pkg used blocks, 8 - summary of shm used blocks, 16 - short status instead of dump.

section.title: core.mem_status_mode
section.para: print status for free or all memory fragments.

section.title: core.corelog
section.para: log level for non-critical core error messages.

section.title: core.latency_cfg_log
section.para: log level for printing latency of routing blocks.

section.title: core.latency_log
section.para: log level for latency limits alert messages.

section.title: core.latency_limit_db
section.para: limit is ms for alerting on time consuming db commands.

section.title: core.latency_limit_action
section.para: limit is ms for alerting on time consuming config actions.
